      • updateUserFollower

                         java.lang.Integer id2)
        UpdateUserFollowerUser ,this function to store data of new user that followed by current user
        Parameters:
        id1 - provided first user id who want to follow another user
        id2 - provided second user id who will be followed
        Returns:
        will return true if find the id of user that want to follow and update the data return false if not find this user

      • unfollowUser

        unfollowUser , this function used to delete and update data of followers of the user
        Parameters:
        id_1 - provided follower id user
        id_2 - provided followed id user who will be unfollowed
        Returns:
        boolean object true if find the ids of the both users and update data if not find the id of one of them then return false
